issue.title: [C++] Implement MapType, MapArray, MapBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5326](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5326). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add implementation of MapType https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/format/Schema.fbs#L55-L82

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5326?focusedCommentId=16840555) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
I think this already exists as ARROW-1207 but doesn't mention the builder. Not sure if there should be a separate issue for that.
